title: 148862522.things You Dont Have To Do At The Office
excerpt:
- You don’t have to take out the trash (most of the time). 
 - You don’t have to do any physical labor. 
 - You don’t have to walk 5 miles for water. 
 - You’re not on your feet all day. 
 - No sweat,

children.text: - You don’t have to take out the trash (most of the time).
- You don’t have to do any physical labor.
- You don’t have to walk 5 miles for water.
- You’re not on your feet all day.
- No sweat, no blood, no tears, no major flucuations in temperature.
Instead, you get paid to exercise your mind, to leverage technology that took generations to develop, and to do a thing, learn a skill, master a craft, that only makes you more valuable by the day.
